complaint.description: They sold a router to an old lady who doesn't speak English and promised a refund after returning the router, but no refund has been received despite numerous calls and speaking to a robot.
complaint.suggestion: Provide the promised refund to the customer and improve customer service to prevent similar issues in the future.

meta.review_content:
First of all they phoned an old lady of 74, May 2022, she doesn't speak English.
They "sold" a router to her, I've returned the router within 7 days.
End of October 2022 after numerous calls and speaking to a robot, I still have nothing. A pensioner without money!!
After promises of refund, nothing.
